main.name: Samuel.Ogun
main.description: I am a Full Stack Developer with a mind for Product Management. I enjoy taking ideas from  concept to production.
main.bio: Curiosity describes my journey be it fitness, coding, or running an e-commerce company. My background spans Psychology, Health, Products Management, and Web Development. My experiences have granted me the opportunity to take several projects and apps from concepts to launch. I look forward to working together.
main.contactmessage: Dont be shy, reachout!!! and lets create  something amazing.

education.description: Product Management covers data analytics, building software product, interview for product management, and scrum/ agile methodologies.

Algorithem & Data Structure (ADS) is a lecture based on a algorithm analysis, Big-O notation, array, sequence, stacks queues,lists,recursion,trees, sorting and searching algorithms. And data they work with.
An intense online coding bootcamp that teaches software engineering, computer programming, data science, and cybersecurity analytics
With B.S in Psychology, I lead  research within and outside of the USA, ran 2 nurse home representing an estimated annual $14 million of service.
